parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake rotors can lead to extended stopping distances, which can increase the risk of accidents and compromise vehicle safety.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal travels to the floorboard
the vehicle takes longer to stop
the brake rotors deteriorate prematurely
the brake rotors need to be replaced frequently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake lines can cause a loss of brake fluid, leading to a loss of braking power, which can increase the risk of accidents and compromise vehicle safety.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal travels to the floorboard
there is a fluid leak
the brakes fail to provide maximum braking power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the vehicle to slide or lose control, increasing the risk of accidents and compromising vehicle safety.
symptoms: The ABS light comes on
the vehicle slides or loses control when the brake pedal is applied
a clunking sound is heard when the brake pedal is applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause the vehicle to take longer to stop, increasing the risk of accidents and compromising vehicle safety.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal travels to the floorboard
the vehicle takes longer to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper motor can cause reduced visibility during inclement weather conditions, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Windshield wipers work intermittently
windshield wipers stop working during rain or snow
windshield wipers are slow or erratic
windshield wipers make unusual noises.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Ineligible Recall for Windshield Wiper Motor Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The ineligibility of the vehicle for the recall can lead to continued exposure to the risk of accidents due to reduced visibility during inclement weather conditions.
symptoms: Same as above
with the added frustration of being informed that the vehicle is not covered under the recall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The paint defect and peeling can lead to rust and corrosion, compromising the vehicle's structural integrity and potentially causing safety issues. Additionally, the peeling paint can lead to increased maintenance costs and decreased resale value.
symptoms: Paint peeling off
flaking
or bubbling
exposing the underlying metal
rust or corrosion spots
uneven paint finish
paint cracks.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Notification for Paint Recalls
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to notify vehicle owners of paint recalls can lead to delayed or missed repairs, potentially causing safety issues and increased maintenance costs.
symptoms: No notification received from the manufacturer or dealership regarding paint recalls
despite being the original owner
warranty has expired.
